_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The things that are prone to being fette: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Sounds that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Smells that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Tastes that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Touches that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Thoughts known by the mind that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
The fetter [sn35.122:1.10]: The desire and greed for the things that are prone to being fettered
